title: Concussive Smash
content:
(Bludgeoning) CON Save to avoid being Dazed Recharge: Short Rest

How to unlock Concussive Smash

Concussive Smash can be unlocked by the following types of Weapons: Clubs Greatclubs Morningstars Maces Mauls Warhammers

Clubs Greatclubs Morningstars Maces Mauls Warhammers

Concussive Smash Tips & Notes

If you are able to apply Daze with this action, creatures will have a disadvantage on Wisdom Saving Throws, can't take Reactions, and lose the Dexterity bonus to their Armour Class. Notes & Tips
